mapper.select: SELECT revi.REVI_NO, revi.OPT_NO, revi.BUY_NO, revi.REVI_CONTENT, revi.REVI_STAR, revi.REVI_REG_DATE, revi.REVI_MOD_DATE, revi.REVI_IP, revi.REVI_USER_ID, revi.REVI_PARENT_NO, u.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME FROM REVIEWS revi INNER JOIN users u ON u.user_id = revi.revi_user_id WHERE revi.REVI_PARENT_NO = #{prodNo} ORDER BY revi.REVI_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEWS (REVI_NO, REVI_CONTENT, REVI_STAR, REVI_REG_DATE, REVI_IP, REVI_USER_ID, REVI_PARENT_NO, BUY_NO, OPT_NO) VALUES ( SEQ_REVIEWS.NEXTVAL, #{review.reviContent}, #{review.reviStar}, SYSDATE , '111.11.11.1', #{userId}, ${review.reviParentNo}, #{buyNo}, #{optNo})
